subtitle: With the recent surge of pro/influencer pay-per-view exhibitions, entertaining millions of fans worldwide, Generating billions of revenue per year, we aim to utilise on this  and be the first ever token to incorporate cryptocurrency into the ppv/sports industry by hosting our own exhibitions in which holders will be payed a percentage of revenue generated.
use: The first cryptocurrency to apply utility and blockchain technology into a real-world industry.
motto: Setting the stage for the revolution of sports.
